title: Data Engineer
desc: Build and maintain data pipelines; schedule workflows; write SQL and Python ETL; collaborate with analysts and engineers.

title: ML Engineer
desc: Train and deploy ML models; implement MLOps basics; package models with Docker; collaborate on APIs (FastAPI/Flask).

title: Data Analyst
desc: Build dashboards and reports; perform exploratory data analysis; write SQL queries; communicate insights to stakeholders.

title: Backend Developer
desc: Design and build REST APIs with FastAPI; write tests; collaborate with data and frontend teams.

title: Frontend Developer
desc: Build responsive web UIs with React and modern CSS; collaborate with backend.

title: Full-Stack Developer
desc: Implement end-to-end features across React frontend and Node/Express APIs.

title: Mobile App Developer (Android)
desc: Build Android apps, integrate REST APIs, write unit tests and simple CI.

title: Mobile App Developer (iOS)
desc: Develop iOS apps with Swift; integrate APIs; basic app store process.

title: DevOps Engineer
desc: Automate build/deploy pipelines; containerize apps; support developers.

title: Site Reliability Engineer
desc: Monitor services, handle incidents, improve reliability and observability.

title: Cloud Engineer (AWS)
desc: Provision cloud infra with IaC; manage EC2/S3; basic networking and security.

title: QA Engineer (Manual)
desc: Write test cases, execute manual tests, manage bugs and sanity checks.

title: QA Automation Engineer
desc: Automate regression tests; integrate with CI; maintain test frameworks.

title: Security Analyst (SOC)
desc: Monitor SIEM alerts, triage incidents, document response procedures.

title: Penetration Tester (Junior)
desc: Assist with web/app pentests, write findings mapped to OWASP Top 10.

title: Network Engineer (Junior)
desc: Configure switches/routers, troubleshoot connectivity, document networks.

title: Systems Administrator
desc: User/admin management, patching, backups; basic automation.

title: IT Support / Help Desk
desc: Resolve tickets, set up laptops/accounts, escalate issues when needed.

title: Analytics Engineer
desc: Model clean datasets with dbt; enforce data quality; support BI users.

title: Data Architect (Junior)
desc: Design schemas, define data contracts, support scalable analytics.

title: NLP Engineer
desc: Build text models, fine-tune transformers, deploy inference APIs.

title: Computer Vision Engineer
desc: Train/evaluate CV models; data augmentation; basic deployment.

title: MLOps Engineer
desc: Package and deploy models; automate training pipelines and monitoring.

title: Business Analyst
desc: Gather requirements, map processes, write specs; basic SQL reporting.

title: Project Coordinator
desc: Support PMs, track tasks, facilitate standups, maintain project docs.

title: Product Manager (Junior)
desc: Write PRDs, prioritize backlog, run small experiments, analyze impact.

title: UX/UI Designer
desc: Wireframes, mockups, design systems; collaborate with developers.

title: Digital Marketing Specialist
desc: Plan campaigns, manage ads, track conversion and SEO health.

title: Financial Analyst (Junior)
desc: Build models, forecasts, variance analysis; create concise dashboards.

title: HR Generalist (Junior)
desc: Support recruiting, onboarding, policy docs; coordinate with teams.

title: Java Backend Developer
desc: Build REST services with Spring Boot; write unit tests; integrate with databases and queues.

title: .NET Backend Developer
desc: Implement APIs with ASP.NET Core; write SQL queries; basic cloud deployment.

title: PHP Laravel Developer
desc: Develop CRUD features in Laravel; build REST endpoints; maintain MySQL schemas.

title: Ruby on Rails Developer
desc: Build Rails apps; model data in PostgreSQL; follow Git-based workflows.

title: Go Backend Engineer
desc: Write Go microservices; containerize with Docker; connect to SQL stores.

title: Rust Backend Engineer
desc: Implement safe, fast backend services in Rust; basic Linux ops.

title: Node.js Backend Developer
desc: Build Express APIs; handle auth and CRUD; write simple integration tests.

title: GraphQL API Developer
desc: Design GraphQL schemas; integrate with REST and databases.

title: Vue.js Frontend Developer
desc: Implement responsive UI with Vue; consume REST APIs; basic state management.

title: Svelte Frontend Developer
desc: Build fast web interfaces in Svelte; connect to JSON APIs; accessibility basics.

title: React Next.js Developer
desc: Create SSR/SSG pages in Next.js; style with modern CSS frameworks.

title: Release/Build Engineer
desc: Own build pipelines and release automation; maintain CI workflows.

title: Observability Engineer
desc: Instrument services; create dashboards/alerts; assist with on-call readiness.

title: Database Administrator
desc: Manage databases, users, backups; performance checks and upgrades.

title: Search Engineer
desc: Design indexes/queries in Elasticsearch; build small ETL feeds in Python.

title: Big Data Engineer
desc: Process large datasets with Spark; stream data via Kafka; batch orchestration.

title: Databricks Data Engineer
desc: Develop notebooks/jobs on Databricks; optimize Spark transforms.

title: Snowflake Data Engineer
desc: Model data with dbt on Snowflake; enforce quality checks; schedule jobs.

title: Data Quality Engineer
desc: Define tests in dbt; write validation scripts; report data health.

title: BI Developer (Power BI)
desc: Build Power BI reports; transform data with Power Query; DAX basics.

title: Tableau Developer
desc: Design interactive Tableau dashboards; author performant SQL.

title: Product Analyst
desc: Analyze funnels and experiments; own product metrics; write SQL for insights.

title: Marketing Analyst
desc: Evaluate campaigns and SEO/SEM performance; build weekly reports.

title: Solutions Engineer (Pre-Sales)
desc: Demo integrations; prototype scripts; assist customers with API usage.

title: Technical Writer
desc: Write developer docs and runbooks; maintain API guides and changelogs.

title: Customer Success Engineer
desc: Troubleshoot customer issues; query data; document solutions and playbooks.

title: SDET (QA + Dev)
desc: Automate end-to-end tests; write API tests; integrate with CI pipelines.

title: Performance Test Engineer
desc: Design load tests; run performance baselines; report bottlenecks.

title: Cloud Support Associate
desc: First-line cloud support; troubleshoot networking and instance issues.

title: Kubernetes Platform Engineer
desc: Operate Kubernetes clusters; manage deployments; write Helm charts.

title: Infrastructure-as-Code Engineer
desc: Provision infra with Terraform; automate config with Ansible; CI hooks.

title: Embedded Software Engineer
desc: Write C/C++ for embedded Linux; cross-compile; basic hardware bring-up.

title: Bioinformatics Analyst
desc: Process biological datasets; run statistical analysis; produce notebooks.

title: Econometrics Analyst
desc: Build econometric models; query data; present findings with charts.

title: Operations Research Analyst
desc: Solve optimization problems; run simulations; summarize results.

title: Data Visualization Engineer
desc: Create interactive visuals; prototype dashboards; communicate insights.

title: Data Privacy & Compliance Analyst
desc: Maintain data inventories; document controls; coordinate compliance tasks.

title: Technical Program Manager
desc: Plan milestones; track risks; facilitate cross-team delivery.

title: Scrum Master
desc: Run ceremonies; remove blockers; coach teams on Agile practices.

title: Social Media Manager
desc: Plan social campaigns; monitor engagement; report growth metrics.

title: Content Writer (Technical SEO)
desc: Create technical content; optimize for search; track performance.
